msbt.message:
Like my outfit? Of course you do.That's because I'm wearing
previously owned by you! I know I look good.
Notice anything? I'm wearing the you gave me! I think I lend this look a certain je ne sais whaaaaat!
Check it out! I'm wearing the you got me a while ago. I think about you every time I rock this outfit!
How am I looking today? My on point, or what? The look comes from my friend , believe it or not.
Aha! You noticed the designer I've got on, eh? Believe it or not, I got that fine fashionable piece from none other than .
Notice anything familiar?<10_4 /> I'm wearing your !Well, technically "my" now, I guess. I'm giving your stuff a good home, as you can see.
Checkin' out your old , eh?If there's anything else from your closet you think would look better on me, let me know.
Whaddaya think about my , eh?Hey—no takebacks now! Your gift really helped me mix up the "classic " look.
Check out the fly , ehhh?If you need your own, my secret source is
Looking at my fabulous , eh?I'll just say one word . They've got great taste, right?
So, tell me how great I look in my .I was going for bold, cute, daring, and sarcastic with just a hint of in-your-face zazz! <10_4 />Too much?
I feel like my brand is more "cute" than "cutesy," so I'm not sure about But my brand is also not caring what other folks think! At least, outwardly. Ha HA!
I wasn't sure if it was my style to wear something like or notBut it turns out that anything can be my styleif I just do THIS while I'm wearing it. Ha HA!
Alright, folks. Feast your eyes! I'm about to drop the hottest look of the entire season, right now! Psych! I'm already wearing it. This is, like, the "soft open" of fashion. I invented it.
Isn't it strange how the same piece of clothing can look completely different on different folks?That's fashion for you! I'd like to think I bring a little something extra to .
You can talk about fit and finish and the current trends and designers and blah blah blahAt the end of the day, I look great in my .That's all that matters, !

Alright, what do you think of this look I've got going on today? It's basic, right? Ha HA! It's a trick. It's like reverse fashionology.Sometimes the most basic clothes are the wildest, if you wear 'em with attitude.
It is possible to overthink things when you're talking about style. Another word for basicis classic.And don't you think I look classic in my ?
Not everything can be high fashion like "metallic pants" or "literally three beach towels sewn together."Sometimes you need a few basic pieces for everyday wear, like my here.
Look, . Feast your eyes upon my magnificent ! This outfit technically complies with any dress code in the world, so I can legally go anywhere.
One thing you should know about me is that I never let my guard down, fashion-wise.See, I'm not even going to a party right now, but I'm wearing my .Is there a party going on anywhere right now?
Not just anyone can wear , y'know.You have to get a master's degree in Serious Clothing Expression from State.Ha HA! Did I fool you? There's no such thing as State. Yet.
Looks like I'm ready for some in my fancy ? Trick question—of course I am! See you on the sports field, a place with which I am clearly familiar.
Don't let anyone tell you that fashionable clothing can't also be functional, .Like right now, I'm ready to slam dunk a gold-medal home run in my .
Sure, there are other folks on this island who are more accomplished, athletically, than I.But when I wear something like I'm pretty sure I could go pro in or even something like if I felt like it.
Ha HA! Look upon my and despair! It's a timeless look, but no one else has ever made it look this good.
I was feeling classy today, like usual, so I decided to break out the old .What do you think? Classy? Or would you say elegant? Timeless? Or maybe even. Ha HA!
Behold! The power of my fabulous !When I wear elegant clothes, my posture improves, my IQ goes up 30 points, and I can speak Urdu.Not right NOW, I can't. You'll just have to take my word for it.
Feast your eyeson my !I'm pulling it off, right? Or should I literally pull it off and try again?
So, when you were designing this look, did you have like me in mind? Because, well I'll just come out and say it. I look good.
Check it out—I'm wearing an original .No, not like the ACTUAL . Althoughit's a thought.

You're wondering where I got an outfit like this, right? Well, I hate to spill the , but The design was by none other than from . And I believe they call it "Le ."Oh, I added the "Le." It's Italian for "the." So, one could say I added Le "Le." Ha HA!
